mapper.update: update sys_user set user_name = #{userName}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_password = #{userPassword}, user_info = #{userInfo}, head_img = #{headImg}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name, r.enabled, r.created_by, r.created_date from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.id inner join sys_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where u.id=#{userId};
